message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $152. It's my best price, and I think it's a great value for the product.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $142?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $148. It's my final offer, and I think it's a great value for the product.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $138?
I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer, Bob. I've already given you a great deal, and I think it's time to make a decision. I'm willing to meet you at $147. It's my final offer.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?
